attributes.action: Make it law that all further education 16-18 courses to include adults
attributes.additional_details: Mainstream colleges should offer more support for people with SEN as well, it's so unfair how people over 18 can't have the option to do a basic level 1 course such as sports or childcare, I think this needs to change to help fix our colleges to make adults trained for work.
attributes.background: To help the government train people into work, it should involve the education department involved by overhauling and refunding further educational colleges to support more adults with full time courses that have been reduced to just 16-18 under the previous government.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
